rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media should not be posted, there are other options better suited for this.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing of other people.
Use a content warning when sharing news items or politically related media. We're here to be social and respectful, politics can be an unwieldy beast and we'd really appreciate not dealing with it.

When creating an account here note the service is still small and self-funded. I'm don't soliciting payments for this service and intend to keep this running as best as I can. Service interruptions can happen and in this case, I will try my best to bring everything back online as soon as possible.
